column4: Hi -- I'm a Linux newbie, and my Ubuntu "Places" menu is acting strangely -- it won't stay open. I click on it, it opens, then closes again before I can select an item. Other menus ok. What's happening?
what happens if you click on the system menu then scroll over onto the places menu?
Click on the system menu and it stays open. Move to the Places menu, System menu closes, Places menu opens and closes immediately. Same behaviour whether or not I keep the mouse down.
sorry, no idea what to tell you then :/
